style.sentenceStructure: Mix of short, declarative statements and conversational fragments. Avoids complex sentences.
style.punctuationStyle: Minimal. Primarily periods. Occasionally uses a dash to connect ideas or a question mark for conversational effect.
style.capitalization: Predominantly lowercase. Standard capitalization is sometimes used, but never all caps for emphasis.

uniquePhrases: ok but the weight on this thing tho?

hashtagStyle.usage: Concise. Uses a focused block of 4 tags per post.
